summary: This is an email chain between US Attorney's Office personnel discussing the handling and production of responsive and confidential photos and videos from Jeffrey Epstein's device NYC024362. The emails coordinate uploading files to a shared drive for inclusion in legal production.

persons.name: Frona
persons.context: Appears as a recipient/participant in email correspondence about handling Epstein device files.

events.title: Files uploaded from Epstein device
events.description: Responsive and confidential photos and videos from Epstein device NYC024362 were uploaded to a shared drive for inclusion in legal production.

keyFacts: Device NYC024362 contained responsive and confidential photos and videos related to the Epstein investigation.
Files from the device were being prepared for legal production by the US Attorney's Office.
The materials were stored in a structured folder system on a shared government drive.
